00046 #include <pro/snmp.h>
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * View types.
00050  */
00051 #define SNMP_VIEW_INCLUDED  1
00052 #define SNMP_VIEW_EXCLUDED  2
00053 
00054 typedef struct _viewEntry {
00055     struct _viewEntry *next;
00056         int  view_index;
00057         int  view_type;
00058         size_t view_subtree_len;
00059         OID  view_subtree[MAX_OID_LEN];
00060         char view_name[16];
00061 } VIEW_LIST;
00062 
00063 typedef struct _communityEntry {
00064     struct _communityEntry *next;
00065         int  comm_read_view;
00066         int  comm_write_view;
00067         char comm_name[16];
00068 } COMMUNITY_LIST;
00069 
00070 extern int SnmpViewCreate(CONST char *, CONST OID *, size_t, int);
00071 extern int SnmpViewFind(char *);
00072 
00073 extern int SnmpCommunityCreate(CONST char *, int, int);
00074 extern int SnmpCommunityFind(CONST char *, int *, int *);
